name: Interference skill
description: This mod adds new skill, 'Interference', a new hero, Giselle, with specialty in interference skill and changes heroes with resistance skill to use interference instead
author: avatar

1.4.0: Mod now also contains interference skill itself

chinese.name: 干扰术技能
chinese.description: 这个模组添加新技能干扰术和特长干扰术的新英雄吉赛尔，并将其他英雄的抵抗力技能替换为干扰术。
